content: The rendered CI build is not reflecting markdown changes as they exist in Github. See https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/fhir-mmm-ig/ and compare against https://github.com/HL7/fhir-mmm-ig/blob/master/input/hl7-fhir-us-mihr.xml (specifically see Acknowledgements>"project team" (note the space) and exact verbiage within 'description')

In Github, under Acknowledgements "project team" (has a space) while the CI build shows "projectteam". Also, in Git, the description is "and associated clinical data that supports research questions which explore the root causes" while the CI build shows " and associated clinical data, in support of research questions that explore the root causes"
subtle. well, it's not just a caching issue then
